thread.title: Re: ‘I weep for the future’! Oh lawdy, you’ll never guess what’s ‘Nazi’ now …
thread.title_full: Re: ‘I weep for the future’! Oh lawdy, you’ll never guess what’s ‘Nazi’ now …

author: Penny✓ItsSoFluffy! #GoBolts!
title: Re: ‘I weep for the future’! Oh lawdy, you’ll never guess what’s ‘Nazi’ now …
text:
We could sit here and try to think of a clever way to introduce this article from Mic , but sometimes it’s best to just to let something speak for itself. 
This is one of those times: This is not fake. This is a real article stating that milk is now a symbol of white supremacy. pic.twitter.com/ro2vdni5D1 
From the article : Amid all the tattoos of Third Reich iconography bouncing around, one thing stood out: The neo-Nazis were all drinking milk. They spat it out as they danced, letting it dribble down their chins. Milk, the longtime staple for growing children, is now the new, creamy symbol of white racial purity in President Donald Trump ‘s America. 
It’s all downhill from there.
